302200.descriptionShort: Earn points from challenges in the Demolition group

302300.descriptionShort: Earn points from challenges in the Synergy group

302303.descriptionShort: Save an ally with a heal or shield

302304.descriptionShort: Immobilize then take down an enemy with an ally

302401.description: Ace the enemy team with no allied deaths
302401.descriptionShort: Ace the enemy team with no allied deaths

302404.descriptionShort: Get a takedown after teleporting to a >4 champion fight

303200.descriptionShort: Earn points from challenges in the Clash group

303204.descriptionShort: Play with the same team in Clash tournaments
